flawed_nl_solution:
Machine A can put caps on 12 x 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 bottles in 10 minutes.
Machine B can put caps on 12 - 2 = <<12-2=6>>6 bottles in 1 minute.
So in 10 minutes, machine B can put caps on 6 x 10 = <<6*10=60>>60 bottles.
Machine c can put caps on 6 + 5 = <<6+5=11>>11 bottles in 1 minute.
So in 10 minutes, machine C can put caps on 11 x 10 = <<11*10=110>>110 bottles.
Therefore, the three machines can put caps on 120 + 60 + 110 = <<120+60+110=290>>290 bottles in 10 minutes.
#### 290

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
